ygData.subject: Re: Debit Card info
ygData.msgSnippet: isit? knn... only in japan for 5 months so many things changed... ill check out the uo page later... hehe... oh yea... talking bout regin wedding... anyone got
ygData.messageBody:
isit? knn... only in japan for 5 months so many things changed... ill check
out the uo page later... hehe...

oh yea... talking bout regin wedding... anyone got any idea whats a good
wedding gift? money is not so important (since its one of my old pals)... u
think a deco for the house is good?

cheers,
Nicademous

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 4:53 PM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Debit Card info


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Freddy, when is the last time we meet for UO gathering? I bet it's Lord
> Regin wedding dinner right? Hehe. Now u dun need to be working to get a
> Debit Card. As the name sound, Debit card mean u have to pay BEFORE you
> use it for payment, which is the total opposite from Credit card (debit &
> credit, accounting terms). I think u just need to throw in 500 or 1000
> buck with the bank, and keep a min deposite, then u can use the card liao.
>
> Btw, check out our UO guild site Roster page, they now put up some fantasy
> char pic linked to some member names. Someone pick a Warlord pic for my
> Dark Flame, look really cool ;)
>
> p/s: The polars below the warlord is a sign that they missed my polar
> sparring house, LOL
>
> On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 3:14 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > Hi,
> > maybe i didnt catch up from previous mails...
> >
> > whats your current status? you working? if so, i dont think its that
> > difficult to get a credit card or debit card unless u have tons of loans
> > with banks n stuff.... if u r a student, u can pretty much forget it
> since i
> > dont think they will give u one. try getting your parents to do it for u
> > instead... i.e., sup card...
> >
> > thast all i gotta say... and good luck in it... we need u in the bloody
> > game!
> > Nicademous
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Ebon Praetor <kelc@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>; < DaNNY > <sci60553@...>

> > >
> > > Apparently, DBS/POSB, despite being the "biggest" bank in

> > > their debit card, or any way to easily search for that information.
> > >
> > > One would be inclined to believe they lack this service altogether...
> > >
> > >
> > > P.S: I hope you don't mind, Danny; I posted to you and the local
> > > EQ mailing list at the same time.
